foreignData.name: Rächender Druide
foreignData.text: Wenn der Rächende Druide einem Gegner Schaden zufügt, kannst du Karten von deiner Bibliothek aufdecken, bis du eine Landkarte aufdeckst. Bringe das Land direkt ins Spiel und lege alle anderen aufgedeckten Karten auf deinen Friedhof.

name: Avenging Druid
originalText: If Avenging Druid damages any opponent, you may reveal cards from your library until you reveal a land card. Put that land into play and put all other revealed cards into your graveyard.

rulings.text: The ability does not work if all damage is prevented.
Putting a land onto the battlefield does not count as playing a land.

text: Whenever Avenging Druid deals damage to an opponent, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
